document_data.name: Pelardh
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pelardh''' clan was one of the rich and powerful families that were members of the [[Onsruur]] (the council of lords) in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the [[1372 DR|Year of Wild Magic, 1372 DR]].{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|88}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 66: Khôltar, Part 17, More on the Onsruur}}
document_data.Organization: This bloodline tended to be small in body with angular features and high energy. They liked fine dining and trying new, exotic dishes,  and frequently brought foreign cooks and foods to the Iron City for the family to enjoy. They were considered fair dealers and trustworthy business partners.
document_data.Activities: The Pelardh owned a number of metal decorating companies, offering embossing, engraving, chasing, and plating services.
document_data.Relationships: This family was on good terms with many [[dwarves]] of the [[Deep Realm]] and bitter rivals of the [[Voaphangh]] clan.
